title: WTB T206 miscuts with name at top
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTB T206 miscuts with name at top
posts.post_content: I think I've only picked up one in the past two months (thanks Lee!)... looking to add a few more to my collection.  I will pay (trade with) a slight premium over the standard value at the grade (whether raw or encapsulated).  I'm fairly picky... generally I like to see the entire name at top like the ones below but sometimes make exceptions.
Are there no more out there?  Or are they being hoarded?  :D
Found a nice one on eBay... no sellers here?

[quote name="t206hound" post=952053]Found a nice one on eBay... no sellers here?[/QUOTE]

Yes sir, I am eyeballing that one on Ebay too. A bit pricey but the colors are very bold. I wanted to get your Cobb when it was listed on here but dropped the ball. Still looks good!
been a few weeks... I'm still looking...
Found a nice Chase (thanks to a few board members) on eBay... still looking for more...
